about_the_game:
Your loyal bird partner, announces the arrival of the barge! All hands on board! When guests come to the Spooky Bay, you need to serve them!

Barges coming from around the world
All barges are different and provide their own rules. Learn the rules, overcome the obstacles between you and your guests to reach them.

Comedy horror aesthetics
Drawn from folklore, the grotesque creatures are divided into groups with unique traits. Each of them includes individuals with individual preferences and behaviors. Discover new recipes based on their special orders!



Chop, mix, cook! Reach highest possible dish quality to please the pickiest creatures!

Split the tasks among the team! A fast-paced gameplay will surely force a lot of exciting interactions with other players you can invite in! Thanks to funny interaction animations, you will always find the right way to rush those who are slacking off!


Absurdly weird animals and plants await all around the island! Peel off folds of meat from plants, catch flying leaflies and potato fairies, milk worms and listen to the soothing shrieks of noiseshrooms!



The conclusion of Fiesta is a rewarding experience. You can acquire better kitchenware, new clothes and decorations!

Personalize your experience
After each successful Fiesta, more and more furniture and decorations end up in your hands. Arrange the interior of the resort your way! Prepare rooms for guests to rent, meet their needs and reach the highest rating!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 / AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750Ti / AMD R7 265X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gaming in 1080p, 30FPS+ with low graphics details. Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. SSD recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 Super / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gaming in 1080, 60FPS+ with high graphic details. Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. SSD recommended.

short_description: Spooky Bay is a fast-paced cooking game where you manage a resort for surreal horror creatures. Play solo or co-op with your friends to spice up your experience with an array of funny interactions! Prepare exquisite food and rooms for your guests, and when they arrive – quickly serve them!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese
